value:
All these scholars gathered to study...
Noisy, aren't they? Irritating.

Though this is a different world, the
essence of magic is the same. I must
report this to Lord Nergal.

None in the Black Fang could match
my magical talent, but perhaps the
mages of Khadein will come close.

I can't seem to reach the highest
shelf... Would you mind helping me?
You'd make the perfect footstool.

What do you need? I'm quite busy
with my surveillance duties.

I was tasked with delivering the
"eternal regards" of your friend
$Nf. That was it.

Let us dedicate this victory to Lady
Sonia! Her perfection is the shining
example I strive for!

This was a worthwhile learning
experience. Now for the next one.

I can offer no excuse. Results
are what matter.

I don't wish to take in impure power,
but... It would be unnatural for me to
refuse. I will accept this—for now.

I am Ursula. As you can see, I am
studying the magic of Khadein. I hope
that I meet your expectations.

Hello, Summoner. I am always happy
to hear from you... So tell me, do you
like this outfit?$k$pAh, but I suppose you're too busy
wondering why I came all this way,
dressed like this, no less.$k$pWhat am I plotting? What is my true
mission here? Given my history, those
questions are only natural.$k$pStill, there is no need to be so
guarded. Relax, for you are not my
target. At least...not today.$k$pTruth be told, I am simply here out of
curiosity. What is it that YOU desire?
Not that I would fulfill it, of course.$k$pInstead, I will show you exactly why
the Blue Crow's skills shone as the
greatest among the Black Fang.$k$pI once served beauty and power, but
now... I serve you. So, enough of that
blank look. I demand awe.
Just give up already.
You think we're equals?
Out of my sight, filth.
This is child's play.
This is not possible…
You have my thanks for the invitation. This festival should prove quite fruitful.
At least try to make sure your naiveté does not get you killed.
No amount of effort by human refuse can lead to improvement.
Being able to wield magic this powerful is proof that I was chosen to lead.
Now then, who do I have to kill around here to get my hands on a powerful tome?
Lady Sonia... I will become like you...
I'll remain loyal…as long as you keep striving for perfection.
Oh?
What is it you want?
Don't blink.
